005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011
012import java.math.BigInteger;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public interface IPositiveIntegerItem extends INonNegativeIntegerItem {
017  @SuppressWarnings("null")
018  @NonNull
019  IPositiveIntegerItem ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE);
020
021  /**
022   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
023   *
024   * @param value
025   *          a string representing an integer value
026   * @return the item
027   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
028   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
029   */
030  @NonNull
031  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
032    try {
033      return valueOf(new BigInteger(value));
034    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
035      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(null,
036          ex.getMessage(),
037          ex);
038    }
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
043   *
044   * @param value
045   *          an integer value
046   * @return the item
047   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
048   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull IIntegerItem value) {
052    return valueOf(value.asInteger());
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
057   *
058   * @param value
059   *          an integer value
060   * @return the item
061   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
062   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
063   */
064  @SuppressWarnings("null")
065  @NonNull
066  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(long value) {
067    return valueOf(BigInteger.valueOf(value));
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
072   *
073   * @param value
074   *          an integer value
075   * @return the item
076   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
077   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
078   */
079  @NonNull
080  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
081    if (value.compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) <= 0) {
082      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
083          null,
084          String.format("Integer value '%s' is negative or zero.", value));
085    }
086    return new PositiveIntegerItemImpl(value);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
091   *
092   * @param item
093   *          the item to cast
094   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
095   *         cast to this type
096   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
097   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
098   */
099  @NonNull
100  static IPositiveIntegerItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
101    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.POSITIVE_INTEGER.cast(item);
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  default IPositiveIntegerItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
106    return valueOf(cast(item).asInteger());
107  }
108}
